about.title: About Us
about.content:
At doctor bike, we strive to bring a real transformation in the construction industry by providing innovative and effective tools that enable work teams to efficiently monitor construction projects. Our app aims to improve project management, enhance communication between all involved parties, and reduce risks, contributing to on-time delivery with the highest quality standards.

Through doctor bike, we provide you the ability to track progress on site, monitor performance, and manage tasks easily, in addition to ensuring safety compliance and adherence to international standards. Whether you are a project manager, employer, or worker, our app offers all the tools you need to coordinate efforts and ensure smooth workflow.

We believe that technology can make a significant difference in boosting productivity and reducing costs. That is why doctor bike aims to be your trusted partner at every stage of your construction project, from planning to delivery.

contactUs.happyToContactWith: We are happy to hear from you! You can reach us through the following channels:

termsPolicy.title: Terms and Conditions for Using the Doctor Bike App
termsPolicy.content:
Welcome to the Doctor Bike app. Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the app. By using this app, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions.

Acceptance of Terms:

By downloading or using the Doctor Bike app, you agree to comply with all terms and conditions outlined here, as well as any future updates or changes to these terms.

Account Registration and Use:

  • Users must create an account to use the app. Information provided during registration must be accurate, complete, and correct.
  • You are responsible for keeping your account details and login credentials confidential and must notify us immediately if your account is compromised or any unauthorized activity occurs.

Permitted Use:

  • You may only use the app for legal and legitimate purposes related to construction projects.
  • You may not use the app for any unlawful activities or actions that violate the rights of others.

Intellectual Property Rights:

All intellectual property rights related to the Doctor Bike app, including software, content, and designs, are owned by or licensed to our company. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or use any part of the app without prior permission.
